definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="explode_with_fire"><field name="mode">MOB</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">8</field></block></value><next><block type="world_entity_inrange_foreach"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="_placeholder"><block type="entity_iterator"></block></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">POISON</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">600</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_iterator"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
